issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
When upgrading to 4.4.0 there is a new class loader warning:

{code}[AppClassLoader@18b4aac2] warning javax.* types are not being woven because the weaver option '-Xset:weaveJavaxPackages=true' has not been specified
{code}

Full upgrade log

Steps:
# start with a 4.3.1.1 cloud
# upgrade euca to 4.4.0 (just upgrading the clc should do it)
# When the db upgrades on first run after upgrade the warning is logged. upgrade still succeeds.
